job.description:
Task_ID: 91
1. Ensure you are logged in to SSMS using your netowrk ID and not the SADN-<client> account 2. Run the following query against each database to check if the users exist:
select * from pdf_user where USER_CD='SADN-CRD' or USER_CD='SADN-TEMPLATE'
3. If the result returns one or more values run the following:
Delete from PDF_USER where USER_CD='SADN-CRD' or USER_CD='SADN-TEMPLATE'
job.name: DeleteSADN-TEMPLATE

command.script: Write-Host "Start Deleting SADN-TEMPLATE users from CRIMS" Invoke-Sqlcmd -ServerInstance $env:COMPUTERNAME -Query " --Drop the record SADN-CRD or SADN-TEMPLATE from pdf_user table in all database EXEC sp_MSForEachDB ' USE [?]; if OBJECT_ID(''dbo.PDF_USER'') is not null BEGIN USE [?]; IF EXISTS (Select * from pdf_user where USER_CD=N''SADN-CRD'' or USER_CD=N''SADN-TEMPLATE'' ) Delete from PDF_USER where USER_CD=N''SADN-CRD'' or USER_CD=N''SADN-TEMPLATE''; END' " -verbose Write-Host "Removed SADN-TEMPLATE users from CRIMS --[DONE]"
